name: Naruto: Adventurous Ninja
description:
Naruto Adventurous, it's a fun game I'm developing. in this Game you will have several different specials and several levels the language of this game will be in Portuguese or English.
Standard controls
Punch, Z
Jump, XY
Special, A
Pause, C
Remembering you can change the controls in "Menu / Options / Control", you can use any control, PS2USB, Acceptors, Wiimoteote, XBox 360, etc ...
